alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Brown; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 2:06AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rock, east central Brown, northern Holt, southeastern Keya Paha and southwestern Boyd Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 205 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles north of Newport to near Bassett to near Ainsworth. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, pea size hail, and very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bassett, Atkinson, Stuart, Long Pine, Newport, Emmet, Mariaville, Pony Lake, Sybrant, Midway and Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 165 and 195. Highway 20 between mile markers 246 and 303. Highway 281 between mile markers 191 and 203. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boyd; Brown; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock
